page.title: 13Junior Field Society
page.content: On Saturday afternoons we go to a meeting of the{Field Society}which is an organisation for people who are interested in nature and wildlife. We meet at Adastra Hall every second week of the month, then we walk or drive to places such as Wingshaven (bird sanctury), Woods Mill (nature conservancy) and we walk around and visit lots of other interesting places. My friend and I have belonged since it began four years ago, but the senior {Field Society}has been going for a lot longer. Reg Adsett usually leads the walks or visits and Mrs. Petrides always comes along with us. There was a competition to design a badge for the junior section and we won the competition.
